name: Socius
body:
# Who We Are
**Socius** seeks to transform community service in cities. We use advanced mathematical modeling and urban science technologies to coordinate volunteer efforts and supplies in real time, and distribute them in strategic locations to help people in need.

We are currently working with the NSF Cyber-Physical Systems program, and actively looking for collaborators and partnering cities and organizations. Please contact us at [contactus.socius@gmail.com](contactus.socius@gmail.com) if you are interested in working with us, or learning more about our project. 

***

# Our Team
* **Yasser Shoukry** is a PhD candidate at UCLA, with expertise in embedded systems and control. 
[[email]](yshoukry@ucla.edu) [[web]](http://www.seas.ucla.edu/~yasser/)
* **Vasu Raman** specializes in algorithms for correct-by-construction design and control. 
[[email]](vasu@caltech.edu) [[web]](http://www.cms.caltech.edu/~vasu/)
* **Min Kyung Lee** is an expert in human-computer interaction and intelligent systems. 
[[email]](mklee@cs.cmu.edu) [[web]](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~mklee/)
